Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-23016 affecting package fcgi for versions less than 2.4.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-23016 affecting package fcgi for versions less than 2.4.5-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package fcgi is earlier than 2.4.5-1, affected by CVE-2025-23016
